text: Mominaharu! Timiharule allahako rasulale bola'ekola'i timi apasama eka arkala'i bola'e jasto nathana. Nihsandeha allahala'i ti manisaharubare thaha cha, jo timiharumadhye amkha chalera bevasta gari gopyarupale hind'ihalchan, hera jasale unako adesako avahelana gardachan, uniharula'i tarsanuparcha ki kahim yasto nahos, ki uniharumathi kunai thulo vipatti a'iparos athava uniharumathi kunai duhkhad yatana a'ilagos
